about.content_01: Catalunya Offline is an application from the Institut Cartogràfic i Geològic de Catalunya (ICGC) that lets you move across the territory, take points and record tracks even without mobile data coverage.
about.content_02: Points and tracks can be organized in scopes (geographic or thematic) and exported t be reused in Instamaps and other applications.
about.content_03: The application uses ICGC's topographic cartography (both online or offline) and with ortho imagery (online only).
about.title: About...

message.pointTrack: Are you sure to delete this element? This action cannot be undone.
message.scope: Are you sure to delete this entire Scope and its associated Points and Tracks? This action cannot be undone.

downloadingAlert.content_01: The whole of Catalunya cartography can be downloaded in a single file, so the map visualization doesn't depend on the data connectivity of your mobile device. If you don't want to download it now, the application will work in online mode (as long as you have data access) and you will be asked again later.
downloadingAlert.content_02: Do you want to download the offline cartography now? (recommended) {{pendingSize}}
downloadingAlert.title: Offline Cartography

import.length: Importing more than {{max_features}} features is not allowed.
import.unmanaged_errors: {{totalFeatures}} entities have been processed for which {{numberOfErrors}} failed to import.

search.noConnectivity: Cannot search because there is no connection.

gpx.label: GPX file
gpx.message: Standard for sharing GPS recorded routes between devices. Does not contain the photos

kmz.label: KMZ file
kmz.message: Google Earth file, contains the geometries and their photos

zip.label: ZIP file
zip.message: Compressed file containing a GeoJSON and a folder with photos

geolocation.backgroundMessage: The geolocation will remain active while tracks are being followed or recorded
geolocation.requestPermission:
Catalunya Offline needs access to geolocation, but access has been denied.

Do you want to change this setting?

gpsAlert.message: It is recommended to enable the gps to be able to continue
